attributes.additional_details: I feel more awareness of self-harm and bullying should be made unfortunately my close friends, have gone through self-harm and bullying and its a horrible place to be.  Looking at sitistics it's clear to see self harm and bullying occurs a lot in younger people, and more should be done to stop bullying and to make more awareness of this.  I urge people to sign this petition in the hope that in years to come the United kingdom will become a better place for younger people.
